statements: SELECT * FROM farm_inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT item_name, item_type, price FROM farm_inventory WHERE price < 100.00;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM farm_inventory WHERE item_type = 'Seed' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT item_type, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM farm_inventory GROUP BY item_type;
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM farm_inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 5.00 AND 15.00 ORDER BY item_name;
SELECT * FROM farm_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM farm_inventory WHERE item_type = 'Vegetable' ORDER BY item_name ASC
SELECT item_name, price FROM farm_inventory WHERE item_type IN ('Fruit', 'Vegetable') AND price < 5.00
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM farm_inventory WHERE quantity < 5 OR price > 10.00 ORDER BY quantity DESC, price ASC
SELECT item_type, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM farm_inventory GROUP BY item_type HAVING AVG(price) > 5.00
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100 AND price < 50;
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY price DESC, last_updated ASC
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE price > 50.00 LIMIT 10
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address, contact_person, contact_number FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC
SELECT item_name, quantity, price, last_updated FROM inventory WHERE quantity <= 50 AND price BETWEEN 10.00 AND 100.00
SELECT * FROM inventory i JOIN suppliers s ON i.id = s.supplier_id WHERE i.quantity > 50 AND s.supplier_name LIKE '%ABC%' ORDER BY i.last_updated DESC
SELECT * FROM inventory
SELECT id, item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory ORDER BY item_name ASC
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM suppliers
SELECT transaction_id, item_id, supplier_id, quantity, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY item_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;

SELECT inventory.item_name, inventory.quantity, suppliers.supplier_name FROM inventory JOIN suppliers ON inventory.id = suppliers.supplier_id ORDER BY inventory.item_name ASC, suppliers.supplier_name DESC;

SELECT transactions.transaction_id, transactions.quantity, inventory.item_name, suppliers.supplier_name FROM transactions JOIN inventory ON transactions.item_id = inventory.id JOIN suppliers ON transactions.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id WHERE transactions.quantity > 10 ORDER BY transactions.transaction_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, category FROM equipment WHERE price > 500;
SELECT * FROM supplies WHERE quantity < 100 ORDER BY supply_name DESC;
SELECT supply_name, unit FROM supplies WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers' LIMIT 10;
SELECT employee_name, role, hire_date FROM farm_employees WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, category, price FROM equipment WHERE category = 'Farming';
SELECT supply_name, quantity FROM supplies WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT employee_name, role, contact_number FROM farm_employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment e JOIN supplies s ON e.equipment_name = s.supply_name WHERE s.quantity < 50 AND e.price > 1000 ORDER BY e.price DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT name, quantity, price FROM equipment WHERE price > 500;
SELECT id, name, location FROM farms ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM supplies WHERE quantity < 50;
SELECT id, name, role, salary FROM workers WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM equipment ORDER BY name DESC, price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, quantity, price FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 10 AND price < 100 ORDER BY name LIMIT 5;

SELECT e.name AS equipment_name, s.name AS supply_name, t.date AS transaction_date FROM equipment e JOIN transactions t ON e.id = t.equipment_id JOIN supplies s ON t.supplies_id = s.id WHERE t.total_price > 500 ORDER BY t.date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT f.name AS farm_name, w.name AS worker_name, w.role AS worker_role FROM farms f INNER JOIN workers w ON f.id = w.id ORDER BY f.name, w.salary DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM supplies WHERE expiration_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY expiration_date DESC, quantity ASC LIMIT 5;
